resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104718</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104718</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205604</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Cherokee Relocation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cherokee Verschiebung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réadressage Cherokee</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relocation Cherokee</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rilocazione Cherokee</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τσερόκι επαναμετάθεση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Realocación Cherokee</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Using primary sources from the Documenting the American South collection, students will investigate the boundaries of the Cherokee lands set for North Carolina after the Revolutionary War.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mit Primärquellen vom Dokumentieren der 
amerikanischen Südansammlung, forschen Kursteilnehmer die Grenzen der
Cherokee Länder nach, die für Nord-Carolina nach dem revolutionären
Krieg eingestellt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En utilisant des sources primaires de documenter 
la collection du sud américaine, les étudiants étudieront les
bornes des terres cherokee réglées pour la Caroline du nord 
après la guerre révolutionnaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando fontes preliminares de documentar a 
coleção sul americana, os estudantes investigarão os limites das 
terras cherokee ajustadas para North.carolina após a guerra 
revolucionária.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando le sorgenti primarie dalla documentazione 
dell'accumulazione del sud americana, gli allievi studieranno i 
contorni delle terre cherokee regolate per North.carolina dopo la 
guerra rivoluzionaria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποιώντας τις αρχικές πηγές από την τεκμηρίωση 
η αμερικανική νότια συλλογή, σπουδαστές θα ερευνήσει τα όρια των
τσερόκι εδαφών που τίθενται για τη βόρεια Καρολίνα μετά από τον
επαναστατικό πόλεμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usando fuentes primarias de documentar la 
colección del sur americana, los estudiantes investigarán los 
límites de las pistas cherokee fijadas para Carolina del Norte 
después de la guerra revolucionaria.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>

N:DONNA HERNANDEZ

        </lifeCycle>

        <educational>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
